column1: The Pit Room////We went to the Pit Room on a Saturday afternoon around 2. There was still a decent crowd lined up. After much debate we ordered just about everything because it was too hard to choose... a brisket taco
column4: brisket and jalape√±o sausage and not to leave out the sides of mac and cheese
column5: beans and grilled okra. I don't know the grilled okra is always on their menu but let me tell you
column6: it should be! Holy smokes it was so delicious. The beans were flavorful and I heard the mac and cheese was great as well. The BBQ sauce is tangy and flavorful and the habanero mustard is incredibly spicy but if you can handle heat
column7: you won't be able to stop eating it.
